div.l: Now play Alayn · for I wole speke of Iohn
This Iohn lithe stille a forlong wey or two
And to him self he maketh routhe ⁊and wo
Allas qduod he þis is a wicked Iape
Now may I seyn þat I is but an ape
Yit hath my felaw som what for his harme
He hath þe Mellers doughter in his arme
He auntred him ⁊and hath his nedes spedde
And y lye as a draffe sacche in my bedde
And whan þis Iape is tolde a noþ̉er day
I shall be holde a daffe a cokenay
I wole a rise and aunter it be my faith
Vnhardy is vnsely þus men saith
And vp he ros and softly he went
Vn to þe cradel and in his hand it hent
And bar it softe vn to his beddes fete
Sone after þe wif hir routyng lete
And gan to wake and went hir͗e oute to pisse
And come a gayn and gan hir cradel mysse
And gropid her͗e ⁊and þ̉ere but she fond non
Allas qduod she I hadde I hadde almost mys gon
I hadde almost gon to þe clerkes bedde
Ey bıı̄enedicite þanne had had I foule spedde
And forth she goth til she þe cradel fonde
She gropeth al wey forþ̉er with hir͗e honde
And fond þe bedde and þouȝt nouȝt but good
By cause þat þe cradel bi it stood
And nyst where she was for it was derk
But faire ⁊and well she crepe in to clerk
And lithe full stille ⁊and wolde haue caught a slepe
With Inne a while þis Iohn þe clerk vp lepe
And on þis gode wif · he leyth on sore
So mery a fytte ne hadde she not full yore
He priked harde ⁊and depe as he were madde
This Ioly lyf han þese two clerkes ladde
Til þat þe þridde cok by gan to synge
